name: HTTP
description: Hypertext Transfer Protocol. Used for transmitting web pages over the internet.

name: DNS
description: Domain Name System. Translates human-readable domain names into IP addresses.

name: TCP
description: Transmission Control Protocol. Provides reliable, ordered, and error-checked delivery of a stream of bytes.

name: UDP
description: User Datagram Protocol. A fast, connectionless protocol, often used for streaming and gaming where speed is more important than reliability.

name: ICMP
description: Internet Control Message Protocol. Used by network devices to send error messages and operational information.
